i18n.title: LicenceCheck
i18n.application.description: Application to verify electronic learner driver's licences.
i18n.application.organization.name: Federal Roads Office FEDRO
i18n.support.title: Support
i18n.verifier.home.title: Check the validity of an electronic learner-driver permit
i18n.verifier.home.description: Electronic learner-driver permits are a federal pilot project.
i18n.verifier.home.policy: I have read the privacy statement and terms of use and accept them.
i18n.verifier.home.confirm-policy.messag: Please read the privacy statement and terms of use, and accept them if you agree.
i18n.verifier.use-case-selector.title: Licence verification
i18n.verifier.use-case-selector.descript: Select how you would like to verify this electronic learner-driver permit credential.
i18n.verifier.use-cases.validity.info-di: It is usually sufficient to check the validity. Detailed information such as the date of birth is not necessary for an accompanying driver, for example.
i18n.verifier.use-cases.allData.info-dia: In some cases, validity alone is not enough. Detailed information such as the date of birth is required for police checks or driving school registration, for example.
i18n.verifier.use-cases.allData.descript: Maximum check, e.g. for creating the file for driving school admission
i18n.verifier.start-verification.title: Show the QR code to the person whose credential is to be verified. They can then scan the code with pilotWallet and review your request.
i18n.verifier.verification-result.title: Request validity
i18n.verifier.verification-result.reject: Your verification request has been rejected by the credential holder.
i18n.verifier.verification-result.timeou: The data transmission failed. The credential could not be verified. Please try a new QR code.
i18n.verifier.verification-result.invali: This learner-driver permit is not valid.
i18n.exception.technical: An unexpected technical error has occurred.
i18n.exception.image-handling: Invalid call. Please check your information and try again.
i18n.exception.file-storage: File system error. Please contact the administrator.
i18n.exception.file-mapping: Error loading verification methods. Please contact the administrator.
